chuxinian《tianxiazazhi》「tianxiayongxugongminjiang<ctrl>]banjiangdianlishi<ctrl>,biaozhanghuojiangqiyeduituidonghuanjingyongxudegongxian<ctrl>,bingqixutamenchixuyinlingtaiwanshehuimaixiangqingming<ctrl>'jinbu<ctrl>'guanhuai<ctrl>'yongxujiazhifazhan<ctrl>,rangquanshijiekanjiantaiwanmaixiang<ctrl>[jinglingpaifang<ctrl>]deqituxin<ctrl>.yuanzhangqiangdiao<ctrl>,zhongyangyudifang<ctrl>'zhengfuyuminjianyingtouguogongsixieli<ctrl>,shitaiwanzoudegengwenjian<ctrl>,jinerchengweiyazhoudiquhuanjingbaohu<ctrl>'qihoubianqianyinyingjitanfeiguanlidengfangmiandexuexikaimo<ctrl>,yidazaogengjianren<ctrl>'yongxudetaiwan<ctrl>.chenyuanzhangzhichu<ctrl>,<ctrl>[tianxiayongxugongminjiang<ctrl>]jingzhengxiangdangjilie<ctrl>,huojiangqiyezai<ctrl>[gongsizhili<ctrl>]<ctrl>'<ctrl>[qiyechengnuo<ctrl>]<ctrl>'<ctrl>[shehuicanyu<ctrl>]<ctrl>'<ctrl>[huanjingyongxu<ctrl>]dengsidapingxuangoumianbiaoxianyouyi<ctrl>,congduojiaqiyezhongtuoyingerchu<ctrl>,pingxuanweitaiwanzuijiayongxuqiye<ctrl>,xiangdangburongyi<ctrl>,tayaozhishangchengzhigonghezhiyi<ctrl>.chenyuanzhangganxie《tianxiazazhi》lianxunianjuban<ctrl>[tianxiayongxugongminjiang<ctrl>]<ctrl>,guliqiyezhangqitouruqiyeshehuizeren<ctrl>,weitaiwanshehuiyongxugonghao<ctrl>'dianfangongchuangjiningjugongshizhuruzhongyaoliliang<ctrl>;tayeqixuhuojiangqiyezaijiezaili<ctrl>,chixuyinlingtaiwanshehuimaixiangqingming<ctrl>'jinbu<ctrl>'guanhuai<ctrl>'yongxujiazhifazhan<ctrl>,chengweitaiwansuoyouqiyedexuexidianfan<ctrl>,bujinrangtaiwanzouxiangshijiewutai<ctrl>,yerangquanshijiekanjiantaiwantuidongjinglingpaifangdeqituxin<ctrl>.chenyuanzhangtidao<ctrl>,guanlicelvedashimaike．bote()cengtichangyong<ctrl>[chuangzaogongxiangjiazhi<ctrl>]()dazaoquanqiuqiyexiayibojingzhengli<ctrl>,mingquemiaoshu<ctrl>[qiyeshehuizeren()<ctrl>]dejingyi<ctrl>,zhuzhangquanqiuqiyelingdaorendangwuzhiji<ctrl>,jiushisikaojiangqiyeshehuizerenhuodongyuqiyejingzhengyoushijiehe<ctrl>,bingchuangzaochuqiyegongtongzhuiqiu<ctrl>[yongxujingying<ctrl>]dejingzhengli<ctrl>.chenyuanzhangjinyibushuoming<ctrl>,xia
